channel.title: Restart Logging In (PI)
channel.description:
Well basically my PI doesn't load Maps when you first login, but after that it loads fine, so I was wondering, whenever you login you would be restarted (logged out), after that you can login.
What and where do I put this?
Regards, James. P.S (rep+cookiez)

item.title: Restart Logging In (PI)
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

i would say look for the method and put if firstTime = true(“load new maps”) or w/e
